issue.title: [C++] Bitmap ToString should have an option of grouping by bytes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8515](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8515). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ToString for anything longer than really sort bitmaps can be unreadable.  Grouping by bytes makes it more useful.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8515?focusedCommentId=17087174) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I'd be fine with making the default to be inserting a space between bytes

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8515?focusedCommentId=17087339) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
looks like there were never unit tests, I'm just going to change it to group-by.
